definition: indulge in pleasure and forget home and duty (idiom)
short name for Sichuan 四川[Si4 chuan1] province/one of the Three Kingdoms 三國|三国[San1 guo2] after the Han dynasty, also called 蜀漢|蜀汉[Shu3 Han4], situated around what is now Sichuan province

sentences.english: "We cannot stay here forever, thought it is so delightful, " said Madame Beaumont .
sentences.chinese: 雖然這裏令人樂不思蜀，但我們不能老待在這裏。

sentences.english: This is really for consumers reluctant to leave.
sentences.chinese: 這真的是讓消費者樂不思蜀。

definition: free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
young people decked out in gorgeous clothes (idiom)
(bird species of China) tundra swan (Cygnus columbianus)
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
elated/light and airy feeling (after a few drinks)/smug and conceited/complacent
a cornered dog will jump over the wall (idiom)/to be driven to desperate action
